name: safari-ball
effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1.5×.

This item can only be used in the great marsh or kanto safari zone.
short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon in the Great Marsh or Safari Zone.  Success rate is 1.5×.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A special BALL that
is used only in the
SAFARI ZONE.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A special BALL that
is used only in the
SAFARI ZONE.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A special BALL that is used only in
the SAFARI ZONE. It is finished in
a camouflage pattern.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A special Poké Ball that is used only in
the Great Marsh. It is decorated in a
camouflage pattern.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:

in the Kanto region and in the Great Marsh in the
Sinnoh region.
